card.name: Skip to my Lou Reed
card.text: Mana 6 Type Galdr- Magic Type Arcane Description Skip target player's turn. If this card has two or more charge counters on it remove all charge counters from that players chambered cards

card.name: Maleficent's Curse
card.text: Mana 9 Type Galdr- Magic Type Arcane Description Cursed character dies if they lose a match.

card.name: Up the Stakes
card.text: Mana 8 Type Galdr- Magic Type Arcane Description Whoever has a higher life total at the end of this round wins the match. Gain life equal to the number of charge counters on this card

card.name: Chromatic Orb
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Arcane Description Hexed player chooses a magic type, spells cast by that player are that type instead of their original type, deal 2 damage to any target as you cast this spell. Must have two charge counters to cast

card.name: Gravitational Shift
card.text: Mana 7 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Arcane Description All spells now cost 7-x where x is the spells original mana cost, with a minimum cost of 0.

card.name: Rework Leylines
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr- Magic Type Ch'i Description Expunge all hexes on the board, then create a hex that targeting you for each hex destroyed this way. You may choose to not recreate a hex for each charge counter on this card

card.name: Flow with the Aether
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description Cantrips hexed player casts cost 1 less to cast.

card.name: Third Eye
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description Hexed player gets +1 Chamber slot. Hexed player may chamber one card for each charge counter on Third Eye

card.name: Support Magic
card.text: Mana 1 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Ch'i Description Gain 1 health, add 1 charge counter to a chambered spell, draw 1 card

card.name: Open Chakras
card.text: Mana 3 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Ch'i Description Expunge target hex

card.name: Sheer Will
card.text: Mana 1 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Ch'i Description Spells you control can't be voided until the end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Strength of Mind
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description At the begining of your turn, draw a card.

card.name: Life Control
card.text: Mana 2 Type Hol-Can- Magic Type Ch'i Description Until end of turn, your life total can not change

card.name: Until Later
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Ch'i Description Draw 2 cards, put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your reserves

card.name: Spirit's Strength
card.text: Mana 1 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Ch'i Description Put target card from your hollows on top of your reserves

card.name: Maximum Efficiency
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description At the end of your turn, draw two cards if you cast exactly 2 spells that turn

card.name: Mind's Vastness
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description You have no handsize, draw a card if two or more charge counters on Mind's Vastness

card.name: Rebirth
card.text: Mana 5 Type Galdr- Magic Type Ch'i Description Change your life total to your starting life total

card.name: Energy Stores
card.text: Mana 4 Type Gladr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description ~ retains its charge counters when activated. You may pay 1 mana to put a charge counter on this card. Remove a charge counter to add 1 mana.

card.name: Self Mastery
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Ch'i Description Void target spell. Cast only if you own 2 or more hexes.

card.name: Runic Ovisa
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Ch'i Description 0 attack 4 HP. Runic Ovisa counts as a hex. You are warded.

card.name: First Cache
card.text: Mana 1 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description Expunge First Cache at any time to add 3 mana. Spend this mana only to cast hex spells.

card.name: This will Happen
card.text: Mana 1 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Ch'i Description Void target spell that's targeting a spell you own.

card.name: Sixth Year Engravings
card.text: Mana 6 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description Whenever you cast a hex spell deal damage to any target equal to the amount of hexes you own.

card.name: Look Within
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Ch'i Description Search your reserves for a hex card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your reserves.

card.name: Preparation
card.text: Mana 1 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Ch'i Description Look at the top 3 cards of your reserves, put them back in any order

card.name: Fifth Year Engravings
card.text: Mana 5 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description Copy this spell for each charge counter on it. You may expunge Fifth Year Engraving to prevent up to 3 damage, deal 1 damage to any target, or draw a card.

card.name: Betterment
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description Increase your chamber size by 1 slot

card.name: Hexed Canid
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Ch'i Description 1 attack, 2 HP. Hexed Canid gets +1 attack for every hex in play. At the end of your tun Hexed Canid attacks the Mystic that owns the least amount of hexes.

card.name: Acclimation
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description Whenever a hex enters play targeting you, draw a card.

card.name: Proactive Strike
card.text: Mana 2 Type Hol-Can- Magic Type Ch'i Description Draw a card. If you own a hex deal 3 damage to any target

card.name: First Year Engravings
card.text: Mana 1 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description Whenever a hex enters play that you own gain 1 life

card.name: Eased Introspection
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description Hexed player may cast Galdr-Hexes as Pro-Cans.

card.name: Weaponized Schemas
card.text: Mana 7 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description Hexes you control become Conjuratoins with attack/HP equal to their mana costs. These Hexes attack whenever another hex enters the battlefield under your control

card.name: Eighth Year Engravings
card.text: Mana 8 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description You may expunge a hex you own to put a hex from your hand into play.

card.name: Second Year Engravings
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description Whenever you chamber a card, you may reveal it. If revealed card is a Hex, put a charge counter on it.

card.name: Third Year Engravings
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description At the begining of your turn add 3 mana, spend this mana only on hex spells.

card.name: Fourth Year Engravings
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ch'i Description At the end of your turn, create a 1/1 Hex Canid that may attack at the beginning of your turn.

card.name: Upswell
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr- Magic Type Deep Description Each Mystic draws 2 cards. Draw a card for each charge counter on Upswell

card.name: Grasping Tentacles
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Deep Description Whenever a Mystic would draw a card aside from their end of round draw phase, instead they draw two cards

card.name: Riptide
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr- Magic Type Deep Description Each Mystic draws a card for each charge counter on Riptide. Target Mystic loses life equal to the number of cards in their hand.

card.name: Tidal Flow
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Deep Description Each Mystic draws 3 cards then discards 2

card.name: Seeking Whale-Shark
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Deep Description 4 attack 2 HP. Whenever a Mystic draws one or more cards Seeking Whale-Shark may attack that Mystic

card.name: Apex Predation
card.text: Mana 4 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Deep Description The Mystic with the most cards in hand draws 1 cards and gains 5 mana

card.name: Rejection from the Depths
card.text: Mana 3 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Deep Description Void target spell cast by a Mystic with four or more cards in hand

card.name: Blackwater
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Deep Description Draw 1 card. Deal x damage where x is the number of cards you have drawn this turn.

card.name: Current Tides
card.text: Mana 1 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Deep Description Hex Mystic other than yourself draws a card you draw a card as well. Any Mystic may pay x mana to expunge Current Tides, where x is 3 plus the number of charge counters on Current Tides.

card.name: Tumultuous Flow
card.text: Mana 3 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Deep Description Change the target of target spell to any target.

card.name: Kraken's Wrath
card.text: Mana 8 Type Galdr- Magic Type Deep Description This spell costs 1 mana less for each card you have drawn this turn. Deal 8 damage to up to 8 targets.

card.name: Gushing Anozoa
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Deep Description 2 attack 1 HP. When you cast this spell destroy each non-Deep beast with power less than the number of cards you have drawn this turn. Gushing Anozoa attacks target attacking beast whenever the beast attacks you

card.name: Misguiding Waters
card.text: Mana 2 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Deep Description Until end of turn, whenever you would lose life from another Mystic you may instead discard a card to prevent that damage. Draw a card

card.name: Rumbling Depths
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr- Magic Type Deep Description Each Mystic draws a card. Deal 6 damage to target Mystic with 5 or more cards in hand.

card.name: Aphosis
card.text: Mana 1 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Deep Description As an additional cost to cast this spell discard a card. Void target cantrip.

card.name: Ripple Effect
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Deep Description Whenever another Mystic draws a card put a charge counter on one of your chambered spells. When Ripple Effect enters play each Mystic draws a card for each charge counter on it when cast.

card.name: Benthic Tremors
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Deep Description You may pay 5-x mana and discard a card to deal 3 damage to any target, where x is the number of charge counters on Benthic Tremors when cast.

card.name: Top to Bottom
card.text: Mana 3 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Deep Description You may discard any number of cards to copy this spell once for each card discarded this way. Draw a card, deal 1 damage to target Mystic

card.name: Overflow
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Deep Description Each player draws 2 cards, deal 3 damage to any target

card.name: Deep Blue
card.text: Mana 10 Type Galdr- Magic Type Deep Description Target Mystic draws their entire reserves.

card.name: Overwhelm
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Deep Description Whenever you draw more than 1 card target Mystic loses 3 life

card.name: Oceanic Scouring
card.text: Mana 3 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Deep Description Expunge one hex target Mystic owns for every 3 cards in their hand

card.name: Dark Deeds
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr- Magic Type Delirium Description Each Player discards 3 cards, and takes damage equal to the number of charge counters on this card

card.name: Mind Muddle
card.text: Mana 6 Type Galdr- Magic Type Delirium Description Hexed player cannot cast Re-Cantrips.

card.name: Revel in the Madness
card.text: Mana 5 Type Galdr- Magic Type Delirium Description Take 3 damage, target opponent discards a card or breaks a card in their chamber. Repeat this process any number of times.

card.name: Purge
card.text: Mana 5 Type Galdr- Magic Type Delirium Description As an additional cost, discard your hand. Deal 2 damage for each card discarded this way. Draw cards equal to the number of charge counters on ~.

card.name: Curse of Fifths
card.text: Mana 0 Type Galdr-Curse- Magic Type Delirium Description Draw 5 cards, gain 5 mana, gain "Curse of Fifths" which limits the amount of mana in your mana pool to 5, and at the begining of each round makes you lose 5 life

card.name: Burden of Atlas
card.text: Mana 5 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Delirium Description Hexed player must pay an additional mana for each charge counter on their chambered spells. Remove a charge counter from any card for each charge counter on this card

card.name: Grip of fear
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Delirium Description At the begining of the hexed players turn they take 1 damage for every chambered card they have. Break 1 chambered card if this card has one or more charge counters on it

card.name: Mental limiter
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Delirium Description Hexed player's chamber size is reduced by 1

card.name: Ambrosia of Darkness
card.text: Mana 4 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Delirium Description Gain control of target Conjuration

card.name: Expand Mind
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Divination Description Increase your chamber size by 2. Look at target Mystics chambered cards if one or more charge counters are on this card.

card.name: Empathetic Coupling
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Divination Description You can look at hexed player's chambered spells at any time

card.name: Precision Strike
card.text: Mana 3 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Divination Description Look at target player's chambered cards. Break 1 target chambered card.

card.name: See Through
card.text: Mana 1 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Divination Description Look at target player's chambered cards, draw a card

card.name: Flash of Insight
card.text: Mana 0 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Divination Description Look at up to two cards in target player's hand, and or their chambered cards, draw a card

card.name: Knowledge Puddle
card.text: Mana 1 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Divination Description As an additional cost to cast this spell reveal any number of cards from your hand, void target Pro-Can unless the caster reveals more cards from their hand than you revealed this way

card.name: Plan B
card.text: Mana 1 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Divination Description Shuffle the cards from your hand into your reserves, draw that many number of cards plus 1

card.name: Primordial Beast
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Druidic Description 2 damage, 2 HP. Whenever you cast a druidic spell primordial beast attacks.

card.name: Elemental Ants
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Druidic Description 1 damage, 1 HP. When you cast this spell copy it for each charge counter on this card. Whenever a player casts a cantrip Elemental ants can attack that player.

card.name: Curse of Nature's Severance
card.text: Mana 5 Type Galdr-Curse- Magic Type Druidic Description Affected player cannot cast conjuration spells. This spell must be cast with 3 charge counters on it.

card.name: Way of the World
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Druidic Description Each player gains 2 charge counters and takes 2 damage. Draw a card if you own a beast.

card.name: Elemental Falcon
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can-Conj- Magic Type Druidic Description 2 damage, 1 HP. When you cast this spell Elemental Falcon may attack. Whenever you cast a cantrip you may return this card to your hand

card.name: Protective instinct
card.text: Mana 2 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Druidic Description Target beast you control deals damage to target attacking beast

card.name: Nature's Roar
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Druidic Description All beasts you own attack

card.name: Grand Hunt
card.text: Mana 1 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Druidic Description Until end of turn, all hexes are considered beasts with 0 attack and 1 HP. Draw a card.

card.name: Canid
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Druidic Description 1 attack, 2 HP. Canid gets +1 attack for every other beast you control. Whenever another beast you control attacks a target Canid can attack that same target.

card.name: Life's Flow
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Druidic Description Until end of turn gain 1 charge counter whenever a beast attacks. Draw a card

card.name: Hidden Strength
card.text: Mana 1 Type Hol-Can- Magic Type Druidic Description Target beast you control gets +x attack and +x HP where x is 2 + the number of charge counters on Hidden Strength *This spell can be cast face down from the chamber*

card.name: Feed
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Druidic Description Deal 3 damage to any target that was damaged this turn by a beast that you own. Gain 3 life.

card.name: Momentum
card.text: Mana 1 Type Galdr- Magic Type Energy Description Deal 1 damage, draw 1 card, put 1 charge counters on 1 chambered card, activate 1 chambered Galdr

card.name: Momentum Abstraction
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr- Magic Type Energy Description Move all charge counters from another players chambered card to your chambered card. Draw two cards if there are two or more charge counters on this card

card.name: Sudden Quickening
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr- Magic Type Energy Description Place 4 charge counters among any number of chambered cards

card.name: Energy Liberation
card.text: Mana 0 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Energy Description Remove any number of charge counters from your chambered spells, add 1 mana for each counter removed this way

card.name: Expedite
card.text: Mana 1 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Energy Description Activate target Galdr. Draw a card.

card.name: Inervate
card.text: Mana 1 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Energy Description Put a charge counter on one of your chambered spells with a charge counter on it. You may activate it.

card.name: Energy Spoil
card.text: Mana 2 Type Hol-Can- Magic Type Energy Description Target player loses 1 life for each charge counter on their chambered spells

card.name: Groundswell
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Energy Description If you would place a charge counter on a card with no charge counters on it instead place 2

card.name: Momentary Harmony
card.text: Mana 1 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Energy Description Until the end of your next turn, any time you put a charge counter on a card you may draw a card.

card.name: Twinnate
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Energy Description Double the amount of charge counters on target card

card.name: Vilidae's Favor
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Energy Description Gain +1 mana at the begining of your turn for each chambered spell you have

card.name: Excitable Aethers
card.text: Mana 2 Type Hol-Can- Magic Type Energy Description Deal 4 damage to any target and draw 2 cards. Cast only if two or more other spells were cast this turn.

card.name: Ball of Fire
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr- Magic Type Fire Description Deal 2 damage plus 2 damage for each charge counter on this card

card.name: Blessing of Tyr
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Fire Description Damage dealt this round gets doubled. Expunge at end of round

card.name: Crazed Inferno
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr- Magic Type Fire Description Deal damage equal to the number of charge counters on this card plus 3 to target opponent. You take damage equal to half the number of charge counters.

card.name: Fireball
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr- Magic Type Fire Description Deal 5 damage

card.name: Lava Lance
card.text: Mana 6 Type Galdr- Magic Type Fire Description Spend x additional mana as as you cast Lava Lance. Deal 6+x damage to any target.

card.name: Pellet Bursts
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr- Magic Type Fire Description Deal 1 damage to any target, deal an additional 1 damage to any number of targets for each charge counter on this card, draw a card

card.name: Pellet Burst
card.text: Mana 1 Type Hol-Can- Magic Type Fire Description Deal 1 damage. Draw a card.

card.name: Spitfire
card.text: Mana 2 Type Hol-Can- Magic Type Fire Description Deal 2 damage, Draw a card

card.name: Double Burst
card.text: Mana 1 Type Galdr- Magic Type Fire Description Deal 2 damage, draw 2 cards, discard 2 cards

card.name: Put Down
card.text: Mana 2 Type Hol-Can- Magic Type Fire Description Deal 3 damage to target Mystic. Deal 2 damage to up to one beast that owns

card.name: Wild Hellhound
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Fire Description Whenever any Mystic or beast takes damage Wild Hellhound attacks that target. 2 attack, 1 HP.

card.name: Incendiary Moment
card.text: Mana 3 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Fire Description Draw cards equal to the amount of damage you dealt this turn. Discard 2 cards

card.name: Channel the Heat
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Fire Description Gain charge counters equal to the amount of damage dealt this turn.

card.name: Shackled Anger
card.text: Mana 1 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Fire Description Deal Damage to any target equal to the sum of the mana costs of the hexes that are targeting you. Draw a card.

card.name: Energy Burn
card.text: Mana 3 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Fire Description Remove any number of charge counters from your chambered spells, deal 2 damage for each counter removed this way

card.name: Emotional Meltdown
card.text: Mana 4 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Fire Description All players discard 4 cards, take 4 damage, and lose 4 energy counters.

card.name: Fingers of Flame
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Fire Description Whenever you place a charge counter on one of your cards deal 1 damage

card.name: Overwhelming Heat
card.text: Mana 1 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Fire Description Void target spell with mana cost less than or equal to the total amount of damage dealt this turn.

card.name: Melting Will
card.text: Mana 1 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Fire Description Deal 2 damage to target player. If that player has lost 5 or more life this turn expunge target hex they own.

card.name: Crisp
card.text: Mana 3 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Fire Description Deal 3 damage to any target. If a player is dealt damage this way, they fade x where x is the amount of life they have lost this turn.

card.name: Fire Mystic's Thirst
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Fire-Energy Description Chamber spells face up and activated. Whenever you chamber a firespell this way, add x charge counters to it, where x is the number of charge counters on Fire Mystic's Thirst when cast. Whenever you chamber a non-fire spell, expunge Fire Mystic's Thirst

card.name: Break Concentration
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr- Magic Type Ice Description Break 2 Chambered cards, discard a card

card.name: Law and Order
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ice Description Hexed can't cast spells with a higher mana cost than the base mana for their turn (reword)

card.name: Shielding walls
card.text: Mana 5 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Ice Description Hexed player reduces all damage dealt by another player to them by x, where x is the number of charge counters on this card

card.name: Brain Thaw
card.text: Mana 4 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Ice Description 2 target chambered spells don't activate at the beginnning of their controller's turn.

card.name: Diffuse
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Ice Description Break a chambered card

card.name: Stun
card.text: Mana 3 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Ice Description Deal 2 damage, Freeze target player's chambered cards

card.name: Sinoie's Ire
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Silver Description Hexed Mystic loses the match if they would draw a card and their reserves are empty.

card.name: Black Hole Sun
card.text: Mana 10 Type Galdr- Magic Type Silver Description Target Mystic fades their entire reserves.

card.name: New Moon
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr- Magic Type Silver Description Shuffle up to 6 cards from your hollows into your reserves. If there are three or more charge counters on this card instead put them on top of your reserves in any order

card.name: Geists' Visit
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr- Magic Type Silver Description Return up to two target cards from target player's hollows to their hands, they lose life equal to the sum of the two mana costs. Prevent 2 damage from this card for each charge counter on it

card.name: Shadows' Rise
card.text: Mana 5 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Silver Description Hexed player may pay 1 mana and discard a card from their hand to return a card from the hollows to their hand. Hexed player moves a card from their reserve to the hollows for each charge counter on this card

card.name: Stress of the Black Moon
card.text: Mana 6 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Silver Description All of hexed players proactive cantrips can now only be cast as if they are reactive cantrips. Return 1 reactive cantrip from your hollows to your hand if 2 or more charge counters are on this card

card.name: Unnerve
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Silver Description Deal 3 damage to target Mystic, they fade 3

card.name: Night's Dance
card.text: Mana 2 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Silver Description Fade x, void target Galdr with mana cost of x

card.name: Moon's Favor
card.text: Mana 7 Type Galdr- Magic Type Silver Description Hexed player wins the game if they would draw a card and their reserves are empty

card.name: Night's Unveiling
card.text: Mana 6 Type Galdr- Magic Type Silver Description You may put up to from your hollows into play. Must have at least 2 charge counters.

card.name: Jest of Darkness
card.text: Mana 1 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Silver Description Switch target reactive cantrip with target cantrip in that player's hollows

card.name: Expire
card.text: Mana 1 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Silver Description Search your library for a card, put the card in your hollows, shuffle your library

card.name: Cast Shadows
card.text: Mana 5 Type Galdr- Magic Type Silver Description Create a shadow beast thats a copy of any number of beasts target player owns. Deal 1 damage to beasts for each charge counter on this card

card.name: Edge of Darkness
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Silver Description Whenever hexed player loses life, they lose that much life plus 1

card.name: Shades Unshackled
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Silver Description 3 attack 1 HP. Whenever you lose life Shades Unshackled may attack. You may chamber Shades Unshackled from your hollows by paying 3 mana and fading 3 cards

card.name: Total Darkness
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Silver Description Reaction cantrips cannot be cast

card.name: Second Sunset
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Silver Description Fade 3. Return target Galdr from your hollows to your hand

card.name: Death's Parting
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr- Magic Type Silver Description Target opponent fades 2, you may cast a hex or Conjuration from their hollows without paying its mana cost

card.name: Antipathetic Angles
card.text: Mana 1 Type Galdr- Magic Type Silver Description Fade 2. Target opponent loses life equal to the amount of cards that have been put into your hollows this turn. Draw a card if two or more charge counters.

card.name: Nights' Devotion
card.text: Mana 5 Type Galdr- Magic Type Silver Description Fade 1 for each charge counter. Each player loses 10 - x life, where x is the number of cards in their hollows.

card.name: Pained Reunions
card.text: Mana 1 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Silver Description Each player returns a card from their hollows to their hand. Each opponent loses 4 life

card.name: Night Reptus
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr- Magic Type Silver Description 6 attack 4 HP. Night Reptus can attack whenever a Mystics fades 1 or more cards. It can only attack if you have 15 or more cards in your hollows. When you cast this spell fade 1 for each charge counter on Night Reptus

card.name: Corpse Genesis
card.text: Mana 1 Type Galdr- Magic Type Silver Description Put target conjuration from a hollows into play under your control. You lose life equal to the conjuration's attack value

card.name: Swallow of Darkness
card.text: Mana 2 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Silver Description Prevent all damage that target spell or attack would deal. Instead fade that many cards

card.name: Fraying Reality
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Silver Description When you cast this spell hexed Mystic loses 2 mana for each charge counter on Fraying Reality. Hexed player fades 6 whenever they have go down to 0 mana.

card.name: Compulsory removal
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr- Magic Type Void Description Expunge up to 3 hexes and or curses, deal 3 damage reduced by 1 for each charge counter on this card to each player affected by this card

card.name: Counter Magic
card.text: Mana 2 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Void Description Reduce another player's spell that is damaging you by two damage, deal 2 damage to that player

card.name: Denial
card.text: Mana 2 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Void Description Void target cantrip, *This spell can only be Cast face down from the chamber*

card.name: Imperfect Negation
card.text: Mana 0 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Void Description Void target spell unless the spell's caster discards cards equal to the number of charge counters on this card

card.name: Voidspell
card.text: Mana 2 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Void Description Void target spell

card.name: Numb
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Void Description Remove up to 4 charge counters from your opponents cards

card.name: Counter Force
card.text: Mana 6 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Void Description Hexed player may tuck a card to deal 2 damage or prevent 2 damage any time they could cast a reactive cantrip

card.name: Negative Image
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr- Magic Type Void Description Pick target conjuration opponent controls. Create a conjuration with attack equal to that conjuration's HP and HP equal to that conjuration's attack.

card.name: Remove Meaning
card.text: Mana 2 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Void Description Void all text on tarrget card except any that relates to damage it would deal.

card.name: Thought Sieve
card.text: Mana 4 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Void Description The next time target player would draw cards this turn, you draw an equal amount of cards instead

card.name: Heart's Cowardice
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr- Magic Type Void Description Break up to three chambered cards. those cards get shuffled into the reserves instead of going to the hollows. Gain a charge counter for each charge counter on those cards, if this has 3+ charge counters.

card.name: Inverted Pendulum
card.text: Mana 2 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Void Description Opponent fades cards equal to the amount of damage you took this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Extracted Essence
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Void Description Expunge target Conjuration.

card.name: Spell Refraction
card.text: Mana 3 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Void Description Change target of target spell. New target must be valid.

card.name: Neural Interruption
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-hex- Magic Type Void Description Mystics cannot draw cards.

card.name: Rule of Six
card.text: Mana 6 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Void Description Spells with mana costs of 6 or greater can't be cast

card.name: Gen-Z Automaton
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Void Description 1 attack 1 HP. Gen-Z Automaton attacks at the begining of each turn. If no spells were cast last turn Gen-Z Automaton gets +3 attack until end of turn.

card.name: Black Out
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr- Magic Type Delirium Description End the Round (all chambered spells break, Mystics Refresh, and the next round starts with the amount of mana it would have normally started at)

card.name: Silhouette
card.text: Mana 5 Type Gladr-Hex- Magic Type Silver Description You are warded

card.name: Jeering Simii
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Delirium Description 1/3. Reproachful Simii attacks target player whenever they discard a card. You cannot be attacked as long as you own Reproachful Simii

card.name: Mental Decay
card.text: Mana 5 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Delirium Description At the begining of hexed Mystics turn, they discard a card

card.name: Misery's Company
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Delirium Description At the end your turn, each Mystic discards a card

card.name: Meningeal Flies
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Delirium Description 1/1. Meningeal Flies must attack at end of turn if a card was discarded that turn. Whenever Meningeal Flies attack, create a copy of it.

card.name: Delusion
card.text: Mana 2 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Delirium Description Void target cast by another Mystic. That Mystic reveals the top card of their reserves and if it shares the same type (galdr or cantrip) casts it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Methodical Madness
card.text: Mana 1 Type Galdr-Jinx- Magic Type Delirium Description Once, on each of your turns, you may discard a card, if you do, draw a card.

card.name: Mind Break
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr-Jinx- Magic Type Delirium Description Jinxed Mystic cannot cast spells that cost 4 or more mana.

card.name: Whither the Weak
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Delirium Description Each Mystic with 2 or less cards in hand discards a card and loses 3 life

card.name: Putrid Flies
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Delirium Description 1/1. Putried Flies may attack target Mystic whenever a card enters their hollows

card.name: Swarm of Sickness
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Delirium Description If you own a Fly conjuration, create 4 copies of that conjuration.

card.name: Maggotting Flies
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Delirium Description Whenever another conjuration takes damage, create a copy of Maggotting Flies. Maggotting Flies may attack at the end of your turn.

card.name: Rotting Lands
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Delirium Description At the end of your turn create a copy of a Fly conjuration you own.

card.name: Swarming Flies
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Delirium Description 1/1. Copy this spell for each charge counter on it. Swarming Flies attacks whenver a non-Fly conjuration enters play. Swarming flies take no damage from defending conjurations when attackingthat conjuration.

card.name: Lord of the Flies
card.text: Mana 6 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Delirium Description 0/1. Lord of the Flies gets +1 attack for each other fly you own. Whenever a fly you own attacks a target, all other flies you own attack that target as well.

card.name: Crazed Mind
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Delirium Description Each Mystic discards a card. If you have discarded at least two cards this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Know Your Enemy
card.text: Mana 2 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Divination Description Void target spell. Cast only if you can correctly name two cards in the casters' hand or chamber. They must reveal their hand and chamber to you(if they have only 1 card, name that card correctly. If they have 0 you do not need to name any)

card.name: Mind Read
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr-Jinx- Magic Type Divination Description Whenever jinxed Mystic draws a card, they must reveal it to you. Draw a card if one or more charge counters on Mind Read

card.name: Master of Deduction
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr- Magic Type Divination Description For every card in target Mystic's hand or chamber name a card. Then that Mystic reveals all cards in their hand or chamber. For every card you correctly name they lose 3 life.

card.name: Point of Mind
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Divination Description Draw a card. If you own looked at a card in another Mystic's hand or chamber this turn, deal 2 damage to any target and draw an additional card.

card.name: Frozen in Time
card.text: Mana 1 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Ice-Divination Description Look at up to three cards in target Mystics chamber. Freeze 1 of them. If that Mystic already had a frozen card, draw a card.

card.name: Numbing Crystal
card.text: Mana 1 Type Galdr-Jinx- Magic Type Ice Description Target Mystic places two cards at random from their hand face down underneath Numbing Crystal. Return these cards to their hand when Numbing Crystal leaves play.

card.name: Oblivion
card.text: Mana 6 Type Hol-Can- Magic Type Void Description Void all active spells, Destroy all conjurations, expunge all hexes.

card.name: Buzz Kill
card.text: Mana 3 Type Hol-Can- Magic Type Delirium Description Void target spell, destroy target conjuration, or expunge target hex. Cast only if you own two or more flies.

card.name: Depressing Rejection
card.text: Mana 2 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Delirium Description Void target spell, if you do, lose life equal to its mana cost. Each Mystic discards a card.

card.name: Frosty Rejection
card.text: Mana 2 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Ice Description Void target spell, if you do, put it into its caster's chamber, frozen. (if the chamber is full put it into its casters hollows)

card.name: Beasts' Rejection
card.text: Mana 2 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Druidic Description As an additional cost to cast this spell, destroy target conjuration you own. Void target spell.

card.name: Insight's Rejection
card.text: Mana 2 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Divination Description Void target spell. The spells caster reveals the top card of their reserves, and puts it into their hand

card.name: Benthic Rejection
card.text: Mana 2 Type Re-Can- Magic Type Deep Description Void target spell. The spells caster draws 2 cards.

card.name: Train of Thought
card.text: Mana 5 Type Galdr- Magic Type Divination Description Name a card, then reveal the top card of your reserves, if it has the same name as the card you named, you may cast it without paying its cost, then repeat this process.

card.name: Mental Disorder
card.text: Mana 2 Type Pro-Can- Magic Type Divination Description Target Opponent reveals their hand, choose 1 card and put it on the bottom of their reserves

card.name: Cerebral Pressure
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Divination Description Whenever another Mystic reveals any number of cards to you, they lose that much life.

card.name: Excitable Euron
card.text: Mana 3 Type Galdr-Conj- Magic Type Divination Description 1/3. Can attack at end of turn if a card was revealed to you this turn. Gets +1 attack for every card revealed to you this turn.

card.name: Progression
card.text: Mana 2 Type Galdr- Magic Type Divination Description reveal the top 5 cards of your reserves to yourself. Put one into your hand, two on the top of your reserves, and two on the bottom of you reserves in any order.

card.name: Thought Experiment
card.text: Mana 4 Type Galdr- Magic Type Divination Description Target opponent reveals 3 cards from their hand to you, you may cast 1 card without paying its mana cost. That opponent draws a card.

card.name: Mind Explosion
card.text: Mana 7 Type Galdr-Hex- Magic Type Divination Description Whenever a Mystic reveals a card, that card stays revealed until the end of the round. Mystics may reveal a previously unrevealed card from their hand or chamber to cast an unrevealed card from their chamber or hand without paying its mana cost.
